characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings,  Oathbringer (mentioned),  Rhythm of War

characterDescription: Dabbid is a bridgeman in Bridge Four. During his first run, he suffered from battle shock, freezing on the battlefield and curling up in the middle of the plateau assault in range of the Parshendi archers. He was saved by Kaladin and Rock, who dragged him away and carried him back to the safety of the hollow.
